溾字的基本解释

溾
āi
〔溾浽（
〔溾水〕古河名，在今中国湖北省京山县境内。
回渊。n噄 ）〕污秽。

溾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［āi］
［《廣韻》乙皆切，平皆，影。］
［《廣韻》胡罪切，上賄，匣。］
(1)见“溾涹”。
(2)水名。在今湖北省京山县境内。

溾字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页641第19
【廣韻】乙皆切【集韻】烏乖切，?音崴。【博雅】溾涹。汙濁也。　又【玉篇】沒也。一曰回淵。　又水名。【水經注】溾水，出竟陵郡新陽縣。　又【集韻】烏回切，音隈。又【廣韻】胡罪切【集韻】戸賄切，?音瘣。又【集韻】虎猥切，音賄。又烏賄切，音猥。或作渨。義?同。

溾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
溾字的起名意思

暂无。

light rain

Back to Yuan. n 噄)] filthy.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [āi]
["Guang Yun" B is all cut, flat all, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" all crimes, bribery, box. ]
(1) See "Xin Chuan".
(2) Water name. In today's Jingshan County, Hubei Province.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 641 19
[Guang Yun] Yi Jiqie [Ji Yun] Wu obediently cut,? Yinwei. 【Bo Ya】Fin Chuan. Dirty too.　[Jade articles] Not again. One said Huiyuan.　Also known as water. [Notes on Water Classics] Linshui, out of Xinyang County, Jingling County.　[Jiyun] Wuhui cut, sound Kuma. Also [Guang Yun] Hu Guiqie [Jiyun] Bribery and cut,? Sound. Also 【Jiyun】The tiger is cut, and the sound is bribed. Wu bribes and cuts again, the sound is awkward. Or as 渨. Righteous? Same.
